name: Down The Drain - The Thirst Chapter
name_original: Down The Drain - The Thirst Chapter
description:
Control your water droplet with A and D for left and right movement. Press Space to Jump. Enjoy!

This is an online multiplayer. If you wish to host a lobby yourself make sure to forward port 7777 and maybe set a firewall exception.

This game was made for https://itch.io/jam/mmarmalade-3rd

Contributers: Florian Schatteiner, Johannes Schatteiner, Neil Doppelmayr, Sandro Figo (off-site telepathic consulting)
